page.title: 09A LOCAL FARM (LLWYNDERW).
page.content: The farm is part of a larger complex of 250 acres comprised of this farm, Hendre Bach and Plas yn Cwm.Some land is also rented. The farm specialises in{DAIRY CATTLE. The herd,at present,numbers 92 cows. The store cattle(Beef)have been sold and calves are sold at a week old.A bull(Hereford)is kept to service the heifers while artificial insemination is used on the cattle.A covered area, for 72 cows,is available for winter. They lie on shavings and straw.Apart from "nuts" and cattle cake,there is a self-feed silage area adjacent to the winter quarters. Pigs and sheep are also kept.600 pigs being bought as weaners(Â£60_Â£70each), and sold as baconers(Â£190_Â£200each). The sheep/lambs go for slaughter at the local abbatoir,approximately one kilometre away.
